thread.title: Philly Pretzel Factory opening first Missouri store in Ballwin
thread.title_full: Philly Pretzel Factory opening first Missouri store in Ballwin

author: Lisa Brown St. Louis Post-Dispatch
title: Philly Pretzel Factory opening first Missouri store in Ballwin
text:
The first local Philly Pretzel Factory store will open this year in Ballwin. Philly Pretzel Factory opening first Missouri store in Ballwin Handout 
The first local Philly Pretzel Factory store will open this year in Ballwin. 
The first Philly Pretzel Factory store in Ballwin will open in mid-May by franchisees who plan to open as many as five more local stores over the next few years. 
Doug and Lisa Abbott of Fenton have signed a lease to open a Philly Pretzel Factory store in 1,200 square feet of space at 14744 Manchester Road in Ballwin. 
Doug Abbott said he's scouting other suburban sites for additional locations. Gus' Pretzels in St. Louis, a popular draw for nearly a century, makes an urban outpost of Philly Pretzel Factory unlikely, Doug Abbott said. "Gus' has a pretty good hold in the city" but there wasn't anything like it in St. Louis County when he began looking at pretzel franchises, he said. 
Philly Pretzel Factory has 157 locations, although none yet in Missouri. The closest location to St. Louis is in Indianapolis.
